com.revolsys.util

Class MathUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.util.MathUtil

  • public final class MathUtil
extends Object
    The MathUtil class is a utility class for handling integer, percent and currency BigDecimal values.
    Author:
    Paul Austin
